content: संदर्भः {@--1@} Stringing together, weaving, arranging. {@--2@} Collection, uniting, mixture; <ls>U. 7. 12.</ls> {@--3@} Consistency, continuity, regular connection, coherence; संदर्भशुद्धिं गिरां <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {@--4@} Construction. {@--5@} A composition, literary work; रसगंगाधरनामा संदर्भोऽयं चिरं जयतु <ls>R. G.</ls>; <ls>U. 4.</ls>
